name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Become Eivor, a Viking raider raised to be a fearless warrior, and lead your clan from icy desolation in Norway to a new home amid the lush farmlands of ninth-century England.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City.

name: Call Of Duty Black Ops Cold War
description: Black Ops Cold War, the direct sequel to Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops, will drop fans into the depths of the Cold War's volatile geopolitical battle of the early 1980s.
